field.name: ma_dvcs
field.check: ma_dvcs not in (select ma_dvcs from dmdvcs)⩓exists(select 1 from #unit b where @@table.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and @@table.so_ct = b.so_ct having count(b.ma_dvcs) > 1)⩓not exists(select 1 from sysunitrights b where @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and b.user_id = @user and b.r_new = 1)

field.name: ma_bp0
field.check: ma_bp0 not in (select ma_bp from bidmbp0)⩓not exists(select 1 from bisyspurorgrights b where @@table.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and b.user_id = @user and b.r_new = 1)

field.name: ma_nh0
field.check: ma_nh0 not in (select ma_nh from bidmnhom0 where @admin = 1 or not exists(select 1 from bisyspurgrouprights where user_id = @user) or ma_nh in (select ma_nh0 from bisyspurgrouprights where user_id = @user))

field.name: ma_kh
field.check: ma_kh not in (select ma_kh from &VendorList;)

field.name: ma_gd
field.check: ma_gd not in (select ma_gd from dmmagd where ma_ct = @voucherID)⩓exists(select 1 from #transaction b where @@table.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and @@table.so_ct = b.so_ct having count(b.ma_dvcs) > 1)

field.name: loai_thoa_thuan
field.check: loai_thoa_thuan not in ('1', '2')

field.name: ma_tt
field.check: ma_tt not in (select ma_tt from dmtt)

field.name: ngay_hl_den
field.check: ngay_hl_tu > ngay_hl_den

field.name: ma_dc
field.check: ma_dc <> '' and ma_dc not in (select ma_dc from dmdc where (not exists(select 1 from syssiterights where user_id = @user) or ma_kho in (select ma_kho from syssiterights where user_id = @user)))

field.name: ma_htvc
field.check: ma_htvc <> '' and ma_htvc not in (select ma_htvc from dmhtvc)

field.name: ma_nv
field.check: ma_nv <> '' and ma_nv not in (select ma_nvmh from dmnvmh)

field.name: duyet_dh
field.check: duyet_dh not in ('0', '1')

field.name: ma_vt
field.check: ma_vt not in (select ma_vt from dmvt)

field.name: loai_hang
field.check: loai_hang not in (select ma_loai from dmloai where nhom = '01')

field.name: ma_vung
field.check: ma_vung not in (select ma_vung from bidmvung where ma_dvcs = @@table.ma_dvcs and (@admin = 1 or not exists(select 1 from bisysplantrights where user_id = @user) or ma_vung in (select ma_vung from bisysplantrights where user_id = @user)) and (not exists(select 1 from bidmbp0g1 where ma_vung = bidmvung.ma_vung) or ma_vung in (select ma_vung from bidmbp0g1 where ma_bp0 = @@table.ma_bp0)))

field.name: ma_kho
field.check: ma_kho <> '' and (ma_kho not in (select ma_kho from dmkho where ma_dvcs = @@table.ma_dvcs and ma_vung = @@table.ma_vung and (not exists(select 1 from syssiterights where user_id = @user) or ma_kho in (select ma_kho from syssiterights where user_id = @user))))

field.name: tien_nt
field.check: tien_nt <> 0 and not exists(select 1 from dmmagd where ma_ct = @voucherID and ma_gd = @@table.ma_gd and loai_ct = '2')

field.name: ma_thue_nk
field.check: ma_thue_nk <> '' and (ma_thue_nk not in (select ma_thue from dmthuenk) or not exists(select 1 from dmmagd where ma_ct = @voucherID and ma_gd = @@table.ma_gd and loai_ct = '2'))

field.name: thue_nk_nt
field.check: thue_nk_nt <> 0 and not exists(select 1 from dmmagd where ma_ct = @voucherID and ma_gd = @@table.ma_gd and loai_ct = '2')

field.name: ma_thue_ttdb
field.check: ma_thue_ttdb <> '' and (ma_thue_ttdb not in (select ma_thue from dmthuettdb) or not exists(select 1 from dmmagd where ma_ct = @voucherID and ma_gd = @@table.ma_gd and loai_ct = '2'))

field.name: thue_ttdb_nt
field.check: thue_ttdb_nt <> 0 and not exists(select 1 from dmmagd where ma_ct = @voucherID and ma_gd = @@table.ma_gd and loai_ct = '2')

field.name: thue_bvmt_nt
field.check: thue_bvmt_nt <> 0 and not exists(select 1 from dmmagd where ma_ct = @voucherID and ma_gd = @@table.ma_gd and loai_ct = '2')

field.name: ma_thue
field.check: ma_thue <> '' and ma_thue not in (select ma_thue from dmthue)

field.name: ma_nt
field.check: ma_nt not in (select ma_nt from dmnt)

field.name: ngay_giao
field.check: ngay_giao is not null and ngay_ct > ngay_giao

field.name: ma_rb
field.check: ma_rb <> '' and ma_rb not in (select ma_rb from bidmrbmh)

field.name: ma_vv
field.check: ma_vv <> '' and ma_vv not in (select ma_vv from dmvv)

field.name: ma_bp
field.check: ma_bp <> '' and ma_bp not in (select ma_bp from dmbp)

field.name: so_lsx
field.check: so_lsx <> '' and so_lsx not in (select so_lsx from phlsx)

field.name: ma_sp
field.check: ma_sp <> '' and ma_sp not in (select ma_vt from vdmsp)

field.name: ma_hd
field.check: ma_hd <> '' and ma_hd not in (select ma_hd from dmhd)

field.name: ma_phi
field.check: ma_phi <> '' and ma_phi not in (select ma_phi from dmphi)

field.name: ma_ku
field.check: ma_ku <> '' and ma_ku not in (select ma_ku from dmku)

processing.text: &CheckVoucherRightBeforeProcess; declare @q nvarchar(4000), @duplicate nvarchar(512), @$checkPurOrg nvarchar(512), @$checkVendorBlocked nvarchar(512), @$checkItemBlocked nvarchar(512), @$checkItemVendorBlocked nvarchar(512), @locked nvarchar(512), @field varchar(32), @wsID varchar(8), @voucherID varchar(8) declare @master varchar(16), @detail varchar(16), @inquiry varchar(16), @general varchar(16), @baseCurrency varchar(8), @datetime0 char(21), @d0 datetime declare @user int, @admin bit, @r int, @m int, @y int, @max1 int, @max2 int, @count int, @roundPrice int, @roundAmount int, @roundFAmount int select @d0 = getdate(), @datetime0 = convert(char(8), @d0, 112) + ' ' + convert(char(12), @d0, 114), @status = left(replace(@status, '''', ''), 1) select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @master = 'bim&Detail;$', @detail = 'bid&Detail;$', @inquiry = 'bii&Detail;$', @general = 'bic&Detail;$000000', @voucherID = '&Code;' select @locked = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đã khóa số liệu, kiểm tra lại ngày chứng từ tại dòng %s.' else N'Data is locked, please check the date of voucher at row %s.' end select @duplicate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Chứng từ số %s1 ngày %s2 tại dòng %s3 đã tồn tại.' else 'The voucher number %s1 dated %s2 at row %s3 already exists.' end select @$checkPurOrg = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Thông tin nhà cung cấp %s1 và đơn vị mua %s2 tại dòng %s3 không hợp lệ.' else 'Vendor information %s1 and Purchasing Organization %s2 at row %s3 are invalid.' end select @$checkVendorBlocked = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Nhà cung cấp %s1 tại dòng %s2 đã bị chặn đặt hàng.' else 'Vendor %s1 at row %s2 was blocked.' end select @$checkItemBlocked = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Mã hàng %s1 tại dòng %s2 đã bị chặn đặt hàng.' else 'Item %s1 at row %s2 was blocked.' end select @$checkItemVendorBlocked = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Mã hàng %s1 của nhà cung cấp %s2 tại dòng %s3 đã bị chặn đặt hàng.' else 'Item %s1 of vendor %s2 at row %s3 was blocked.' end select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ws_id' select @baseCurrency = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0' select @roundPrice = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_gia' select @roundAmount = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_tien' select @roundFAmount = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_tien_nt' select @max1 = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = @master + '000000' and column_name = 'so_ct' select @max2 = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = @detail + '000000' and column_name = 'so_lsx' -- Checking update @@table set so_ct = space(@max1 - len(rtrim(ltrim(so_ct)))) + rtrim(ltrim(so_ct)) &ImportOverwriteData; if @check$Unit <> '1' begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', stt, 'C001' from @@table a join bic&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join bic&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; end end else begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', stt, 'C002' from @@table a join bic&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join bic&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; end end if @r is not null and @$mode <> 1 begin if @check$Unit <> '1' select replace(replace(replace(@duplicate, '%s1', so_ct), '%s2', convert(varchar(12), cast(ngay_ct as smalldatetime), 103)), '%s3', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r else select replace(replace(replace(replace(@duplicate$Unit, '%s1', so_ct), '%s2', convert(varchar(12), cast(ngay_ct as smalldatetime), 103)), '%s3', rtrim(ma_dvcs)), '%s4', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_kh', stt, 'C006' from @@table a where not exists(select 1 from bidmnccbp0 b where a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0) and exists(select 1 from bidmnccbp0 c where a.ma_kh = c.ma_kh) &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a where not exists(select 1 from bidmnccbp0 b where a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0) and exists(select 1 from bidmnccbp0 c where a.ma_kh = c.ma_kh) if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(replace(@$checkPurOrg, '%s1', ma_kh), '%s2', ma_bp0), '%s3', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end end if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_kh', stt, 'C007' from @@table a join bidmncctsbp0 b on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 where b.name = 'chan_dat_hang' and rtrim(b.val) = '1' &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_kh', stt, 'C007' from @@table a join bidmnccts b on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh where b.name = 'chan_dat_hang' and rtrim(val) = '1' and not exists(select 1 from bidmncctsbp0 c where a.ma_kh = c.ma_kh and c.name = 'chan_dat_hang') &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_vt', stt, 'C008' from @@table a join bidmvttsvung b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and a.ma_vung = b.ma_vung where b.name = 'chan_dat_hang' and rtrim(b.val) = '1' &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_vt', stt, 'C008' from @@table a join bidmvtts b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt where b.name = 'chan_dat_hang' and rtrim(val) = '1' and not exists(select 1 from bidmvttsvung c where a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt and a.ma_vung = c.ma_vung and c.name = 'chan_dat_hang') &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_vt', stt, 'C009' from @@table a join bikbcdhtvt b on b.ma_vt = a.ma_vt where a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and b.status = '1' &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join bidmncctsbp0 b on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 where b.name = 'chan_dat_hang' and rtrim(b.val) = '1' if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(@$checkVendorBlocked, '%s1', ma_kh), '%s2', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join bidmnccts b on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh where b.name = 'chan_dat_hang' and rtrim(val) = '1' and not exists(select 1 from bidmncctsbp0 c where a.ma_kh = c.ma_kh and a.ma_bp0 = c.ma_bp0 and c.name = 'chan_dat_hang') if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(@$checkVendorBlocked, '%s1', ma_kh), '%s2', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end -- select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join bidmvttsvung b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and a.ma_vung = b.ma_vung where b.name = 'chan_dat_hang' and rtrim(b.val) = '1' if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(@$checkItemBlocked, '%s1', ma_vt), '%s2', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join bidmvtts b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt where b.name = 'chan_dat_hang' and rtrim(val) = '1' and not exists(select 1 from bidmvttsvung c where a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt and a.ma_vung = c.ma_vung and c.name = 'chan_dat_hang') if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(@$checkItemBlocked, '%s1', ma_vt), '%s2', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end -- select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join bikbcdhtvt b on b.ma_vt = a.ma_vt where a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and b.status = '1' if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(replace(@$checkItemVendorBlocked, '%s1', ma_vt), '%s2', ma_kh), '%s3', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end end -- Update update @@table set dvt = case when a.dvt <> '' then a.dvt else isnull(d.val, isnull(e.val, b.dvt)) end, ma_nt = case when a.ma_nt <> '' then a.ma_nt else @baseCurrency end, ma_tt = case when a.ma_tt <> '' then a.ma_tt else c.ma_tt end, so_lsx = space(@max2 - len(ltrim(rtrim(so_lsx)))) + ltrim(rtrim(so_lsx)) from @@table a left join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt left join &VendorList; c on a.ma_kh = c.ma_kh left join bidmvttsvung d on a.ma_vt = d.ma_vt and a.ma_vung = d.ma_vung and d.name = 'dvt' left join bidmvtts e on a.ma_vt = e.ma_vt and e.name = 'dvt' select top 0 ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct into #transaction from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #transaction select ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct from @@table group by ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_gd select top 0 ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct into #unit from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #unit select ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct from @@table group by ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct -- Locked Date &ImportLockedDateCheck; @@checking(1); if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'dvt', stt, '00001' from @@table a left join vdmvtqddvt b on a.dvt = b.dvt and (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt and a.dvt = c.dvt where b.dvt is null and c.dvt is null &w1;'dvt'&w2;stt&w3;'00001'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'dvt', @r = min(stt) from @@table a left join vdmvtqddvt b on a.dvt = b.dvt and (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt and a.dvt = c.dvt where b.dvt is null and c.dvt is null&Error; end &ConfigDynamicImportChecking; &ImportOverwriteChecking; &EndErrorMode; -- Gather select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #id from bim&Detail;$000000 insert into #id(stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, stt) select '', a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, min(a.stt) from @@table a&ImportOverwriteIdentiyDataCondition; group by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct order by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct select identity(int, 1, 1) as id, cast(stt as int) as stt, convert(varchar(8), ngay_ct, 112) + so_ct as c, cast(0 as int) as ln into #ln from @@table order by ngay_ct, so_ct, stt exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateLineNumber create index i on #ln(stt) select @count = count(*) from #id exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateIdentityNumber @wsID, @voucherID, @count, @@userID &ImportOverwriteProcess; select top 0 stt_rec, stt_rec0, line_nbr, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_vt, loai_hang, dvt, cast(0 as bit) as nhieu_dvt, he_so, ma_vung, ma_kho, so_luong, gia_nt0, gia0, gia_nt, gia, tien_nt0, tien0, tien_nt, tien, ma_thue_nk, thue_suat_nk, thue_nk_nt, thue_nk, ma_thue_ttdb, thue_suat_ttdb, thue_ttdb_nt, thue_ttdb, thue_bvmt_nt, thue_bvmt, ma_thue, thue_suat, thue_nt, thue, so_ngay_giao, ngay_giao, so_theo_doi, ma_vt_ncc, sl_dat_tt, sl_dat_td, ma_rb, muc_thue, tl_chiu_thue, he_so_mt, ma_vv, ma_sp, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_hd, ma_ku, ma_phi into #d&Detail; from bid&Detail;$000000 insert into #d&Detail; select b.stt_rec, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Voucher$GetRecordsGroup(i.ln), i.ln, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.ma_vt, a.loai_hang, a.dvt, c.nhieu_dvt, 1, a.ma_vung, a.ma_kho, a.so_luong, a.gia_nt0, round(a.gia_nt0 * a.ty_gia, @roundPrice), a.gia_nt0, round(a.gia_nt0 * a.ty_gia, @roundPrice), a.tien_nt0, round(a.tien_nt0 * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), a.tien_nt, round(a.tien_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), a.ma_thue_nk, isnull(e.thue_suat, 0), a.thue_nk_nt, round(a.thue_nk_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), a.ma_thue_ttdb, isnull(f.thue_suat, 0), a.thue_ttdb_nt, round(a.thue_ttdb_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), a.thue_bvmt_nt, round(a.thue_bvmt_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), a.ma_thue, isnull(d.thue_suat, 0), a.thue_nt, round(a.thue_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), a.so_ngay_giao, a.ngay_giao, '', a.ma_vt_ncc, a.sl_dat_tt, a.sl_dat_td, a.ma_rb, 0 as muc_thue, 0 as tl_chiu_thue, 0 as he_so_mt, a.ma_vv, a.ma_sp, a.ma_bp, a.so_lsx, a.ma_hd, a.ma_ku, a.ma_phi from @@table a join #id b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt left join dmthue d on a.ma_thue = d.ma_thue left join dmthuenk e on a.ma_thue_nk = e.ma_thue left join dmthuettdb f on a.ma_thue_ttdb = f.ma_thue join #ln i on a.stt = i.stt order by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.stt update #d&Detail; set he_so = b.he_so from #d&Detail; a join vdmvtqddvt b on (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') and a.dvt = b.dvt where a.nhieu_dvt = 1 select top 0 stt_rec, ma_dvcs, ma_bp0, ma_nh0, loai_ct, ma_gd, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_nt, ty_gia, ma_kh, loai_thoa_thuan, gt_toi_da, ma_tt, dien_giai, ngay_hl_tu, ngay_hl_den, t_so_luong, t_tien_nt0, t_tien0, t_thue_nk_nt, t_thue_nk, t_thue_ttdb_nt, t_thue_ttdb, t_thue_bvmt_nt, t_thue_bvmt, t_thue_gtgt_nt, t_thue_gtgt, t_thue_nt, t_thue, t_tt_nt, t_tt, t_tien_nt, t_tien, ma_dc, ma_vung0, ma_kho0, ma_htvc, ma_nv, duyet_dh into #m&Detail; from bim&Detail;$000000 insert into #m&Detail; select b.stt_rec, a.ma_dvcs, a.ma_bp0, a.ma_nh0, e.loai_ct, a.ma_gd, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.ma_nt, a.ty_gia, a.ma_kh, a.loai_thoa_thuan, case when a.loai_thoa_thuan = '1' then 0 else case when a.gt_toi_da = 0 then d.t_tien_nt0 else a.gt_toi_da end end, a.ma_tt, a.dien_giai, a.ngay_hl_tu, a.ngay_hl_den, d.t_so_luong, d.t_tien_nt0, d.t_tien0, d.t_thue_nk_nt, d.t_thue_nk, d.t_thue_ttdb_nt, d.t_thue_ttdb, d.t_thue_bvmt_nt, d.t_thue_bvmt, d.t_thue_gtgt_nt, d.t_thue_gtgt, d.t_thue_nk_nt + d.t_thue_ttdb_nt + d.t_thue_bvmt_nt + d.t_thue_gtgt_nt, d.t_thue_nk + d.t_thue_ttdb + d.t_thue_bvmt + d.t_thue_gtgt, d.t_tien_nt0 + d.t_thue_nk_nt + d.t_thue_ttdb_nt + d.t_thue_bvmt_nt + d.t_thue_gtgt_nt, d.t_tien0 + d.t_thue_nk + d.t_thue_ttdb + d.t_thue_bvmt + d.t_thue_gtgt, d.t_tien_nt, d.t_tien, a.ma_dc, isnull(f.ma_vung0, ''), isnull(f.ma_kho0, ''), a.ma_htvc, a.ma_nv, a.duyet_dh from @@table a join #id b on a.stt = b.stt join #unit c on a.ngay_ct = c.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = c.so_ct join ( select stt_rec, sum(so_luong) as t_so_luong, sum(tien_nt0) as t_tien_nt0, sum(tien0) as t_tien0, sum(thue_nk_nt) as t_thue_nk_nt, sum(thue_nk) as t_thue_nk, sum(thue_ttdb_nt) as t_thue_ttdb_nt, sum(thue_ttdb) as t_thue_ttdb, sum(thue_bvmt_nt) as t_thue_bvmt_nt, sum(thue_bvmt) as t_thue_bvmt, sum(thue_nt) as t_thue_gtgt_nt, sum(thue) as t_thue_gtgt, sum(thue_nt) as t_thue_nt, sum(thue) as t_thue, sum(tien_nt) as t_tien_nt, sum(tien) as t_tien from #d&Detail; group by stt_rec ) d on b.stt_rec = d.stt_rec join (select ma_gd, min(loai_ct) as loai_ct from dmmagd where ma_ct = @voucherID group by ma_gd) e on a.ma_gd = e.ma_gd left join (select a.ma_dc, a.ma_kho as ma_kho0, b.ma_vung as ma_vung0 from dmdc a left join dmkho b on a.ma_kho = b.ma_kho left join bidmvung c on b.ma_vung = c.ma_vung where (not exists(select 1 from syssiterights where user_id = @@userID) or exists(select ma_kho from syssiterights where @@admin = 1 or (user_id = @@userID and ma_kho = b.ma_kho)))) f on a.ma_dc = f. ma_dc select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, ma_bp0, ma_nh0, status, user_id0, c$, m$, d$, e$, f$, ngay_giao1, ngay_giao2, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #i&Detail; from bii&Detail;$000000 insert into #i&Detail; select stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, ma_bp0, ma_nh0, @status, @user, convert(varchar(12), ngay_ct, 112) + so_ct + stt_rec, '#10$' + rtrim(ma_gd) + '#15$' + rtrim(loai_ct) + '#20$' + rtrim(ma_kh) + '#25$' + rtrim(ma_bp0) + '#30$' + rtrim(ma_nh0) + '#35$' + rtrim(ma_nt), '', '', '', null, null from #m&Detail; declare @$s varchar(8000) select @$s = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Update$Inquiry$Ex('#i&Detail;', '#d&Detail;', 'd$', 'ma_kho, ma_vt, ma_vung, so_theo_doi, ma_vt_ncc, loai_hang', '#40$, #20$, #30$, #50$, #60$, #65$', 'stt_rec', default, default, @voucherID, 'e$,f$', 1) execute (@$s) update #i&Detail; set ngay_giao1 = b.ngay_giao1, ngay_giao2 = b.ngay_giao2 from #i&Detail; a join (select min(ngay_giao) as ngay_giao1, max(ngay_giao) as ngay_giao2, stt_rec from #d&Detail; group by stt_rec) b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec &EnvironmentTax.UpdateImport; declare @p varchar(32), @masterTable varchar(32), @detailTable varchar(32), @inquiryTable varchar(32), @insertKey varchar(128) select distinct month(ngay_ct) as m, year(ngay_ct) as y into #k from #id select @r = min(y * 12 + m) from #k while @r is not null begin select @m = m, @y = y from #k where y * 12 + m = @r select @p = rtrim(@y) + replace(str(@m, 2), ' ', '0'), @insertKey = 'month(ngay_ct) = ' + rtrim(@m) + ' and year(ngay_ct) = ' + rtrim(@y) select @masterTable = @master + @p, @detailTable = @detail + @p, @inquiryTable = @inquiry + @p select @q = @@inserting(master, @masterTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q select @q = @@inserting(detail, @detailTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q select @q = @@inserting(inquiry, @inquiryTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q &ImportOverwriteInsertingByPart; select @r = min(y * 12 + m) from #k where y * 12 + m > @r end @@inserting(general); &ImportOverwriteInserting;
